title: Far Cry 5: Gold Edition Free Download Direct Link
description:
The main sect is a certain Joseph Sid, he, along with his two brothers and sister, who are distinguished by cruelty and their perverse methods of murder, wants to control the entire district and go further in the future. You, in the role of deputy sheriff, were supposed to arrest Joseph Sid by helicopter, but your helicopter was shot down and now you need to escape and put an end to the tyranny of the “Gate of Eden” – sectarians who recruit people by force or hypnosis. Unite the inhabitants of the district against tyranny , help them in their struggle by completing side missions.
Also, as your reputation increases, you can recruit assistants, including animals, who can fight for you and help you a lot in your business. Happy fourth July America 4th July independence day The huge open world of Far Cry 5 and excellent graphics will give you an unforgettable experience from the game, you can choose the order of completing tasks and seizing territories yourself, you can get to the desired point either by helicopter or by any other vehicle , and if you have already opened the area , in which you need, then you can either move to it, or you will be dropped there from a helicopter.

system_requirements.OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)

game_info.Developer: Ubisoft Montreal, Red Storm, Ubisoft Shanghai, Ubisoft Toronto, Ubisoft Kiev
